column5: Does anyone have an input on the water level........Gord ? Just hopeing to get back into Clearwater for Lake Trout Never had any luck with the Trout holes in the West arm.
Water levels are high. Boats are going up the creek. I prefer my guests using the portage trail and the boats I have in there. The creek can damage motors if you aren't "creek savvy".

Oh Gord you don't have to tell me that,4 yrs ago I put a big 8"-9" crack in the cavitation plate and toasted a prop only making it 3/4 of the way back and had to turn around because of the biggest beaver dam i've seen. Don't know if it was on the way there or back but somehow a 4"-5" beaver log got wedged between the prop and plate How many boats back there ? You want me put put a $100 bill under a rock to use one for the day ?

I have two boats back there, but sorry, they can only be used by my guests (part of the agreement I have to be able to leave them there with the MNR). If you stay here though you can use them for free!
Yeah I knew that was coming,just had to try again
